import React from 'react'; // --- Icon Components (using inline SVG) --- // Icons are now passed as props from App.jsx const IconSave = () => ( ); export default function Controls({ selectedAlgo, handleAlgoChange, arrayInput, setArrayInput, setArrayFromInput, arraySize, handleSizeChange, speed, handleSpeedChange, handleReset, handlePlayPause, handleNextStep, isPlaying, isGenerating, isAtEnd, currentStep, // Icon props IconPlay, IconPause, IconRotateCcw, IconStepForward, // MERN prop handleSaveSort }) { return (
{/* Row 1: Array Input & Algo Selection */}
setArrayInput(e.target.value)} placeholder="e.g., 8, 2, 5, 1" disabled={isPlaying || isGenerating} className="flex-1 p-2 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 rounded-lg shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 disabled:opacity-50" />
{/* Row 2: Sliders & Buttons */}
); }
